--- drop_sequence_if_exits.sql
DROP SEQUENCE IF EXISTS my_sequence

--- AST
&ast.DropSequence{
  Drop:     0,
  IfExists: true,
  Name:     &ast.Path{
    Idents: []*ast.Ident{
      &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 24,
        NameEnd: 35,
        Name:    "my_sequence",
      },
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
DROP SEQUENCE IF EXISTS my_sequence
